title: Narratives for the 2022 Season with Conor Orr
itunes:title: Narratives for the 2022 Season with Conor Orr
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Gregg Rosenthal and Marc Sessler bring you all of the latest news around the NFL, starting with Tom Brady's deal with FOX Sports to become the network's lead analyst upon his retirement. The heroes hit other free agent signings around the league and talk through some of the top remaining players who have still yet to sign with a team. Then, the hosts discuss the primetime games the NFL has already announced this week. After that, Conor Orr of Sports Illustrated joins the show to look beneath the surface at potential narratives that could shape the course of the 2022 NFL season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
